author: Special Correspondent
title: Coming days are crucial, people should strictly adhere to lockdown guidelines, says Ramadoss
description: The PMK founder warned against people becoming complacent before the virus was fully contained
content: PMK founder S. Ramadoss on Thursday said that the recent medical bulletin on COVID-19 cases from the State is encouraging and gives hope that it can be contained. However, he warned against people becoming complacent before success is reached and urged them t… [+1229 chars]
